title: Where is free RP?
body: I got 5 lvl, so where is free rp?

replies.body: Heya! With the launch of Hextech Crafting, new players will now receive a special Hextech Chest in place of the 400 RP.  Check out our [announcement post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) for more details and information as to the reasons why we made this change :)
